short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make LinkedIn Bearable Again! Inject clown emojis into 'humbled' and 'proud' posts and overlay cringe selfies with confused-dog.GIF

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LinkedIn unhumbled: Make LinkedIn Bearable again

Key features:
1. Greys out all "humble", "proud" etc. posts and pre-empts them with a clown emoji (customizable)
2. Classifies each posted image into pretentious selfie (yes/no) and overlays detected selfies with an GIF or image of confused dog

Currently for free - you're welcome!
______________________________

ğŸ“Œ What is LinkedIn unhumbled?
LinkedIn unhumbled is a browser extension that uses Generative AI to identify bragging pictures or posts and modifies LinkedIn content for a more professional browsing experience.

Yes, LinkedIn unhumbled is free to use. 

ğŸ“Œ How does LinkedIn unhumbled work?
The extension uses Generative AI to identify specific phrases in LinkedIn posts and replaces or modifies these phrases based on user settings. It also applies image overlays to self-promotional images.
